  • public class RangedEnemy
extends Enemy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RangedEnemy()
      Creates a default RangedEnemy object with a Gun
      RangedEnemy(int damage, double x, double y, double xVel, double yVel, int maxHealth)
      Creates a custom RangedEnemy object with a Gun, specific velocity at location x,y

    • Constructor Detail

      • RangedEnemy

        public RangedEnemy()
        Creates a default RangedEnemy object with a Gun

      • RangedEnemy

        public RangedEnemy(int damage,
                   double x,
                   double y,
                   double xVel,
                   double yVel,
                   int maxHealth)
        Creates a custom RangedEnemy object with a Gun, specific velocity at location x,y
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of this enemy
        y - the x coordinate of this enemy
        xVel - the x velocity component of this enemy
        yVel - the y velocity component of this enemy
        damage - the damage dealt by this RangedEnemy
        maxHealth - the health of this RangedEnemy

    • Method Detail

      • fireToPlayer

        public void fireToPlayer(Player player,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Structure> s,
                         int millis)
        Fires a bullet to the location of player
        Parameters:
        player - the player object this RangedEnemy has to shoot/target
        s - the list of structures in the Room
        millis - the time interval of shooting

      • getGun

        public Gun getGun()
        Returns the Gun this enemy is holding
        Returns:
        the Gun object that belongs to this enemy

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
                 processing.core.PImage eUp,
                 processing.core.PImage eDown,
                 processing.core.PImage eRight,
                 processing.core.PImage eLeft)
        Draws a graphical representation of this RangedEnemy at its respective location by checking the RangedEnemy's current direction
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet that will draw a representation of this RnagedEnemy
        eUp - the left image of this RangedEnemy
        eDown - the left image of this RangedEnemy
        eRight - the left image of this RangedEnemy
        eLeft - the left image of this RangedEnemy
